price: 他说：“臣仆们啊！在他们来归顺我之前，你们中有谁能把她的宝座拿来给我呢？”
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَيُّكُمۡ يَأۡتِينِي بِعَرۡشِهَا قَبۡلَ أَن يَأۡتُونِي مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāayyuhā al-mala-u ayyukum yatīnī biʿarshihā qabla an yatūnī mus'limīna
